title: When you survive a very close fight. . . .
body:
Only to be pounced on by the jungler before you can recall. . . .

http://i.imgur.com/gdNv9dJ.gif

replies.body: {{champion:154}} ?
{{champion:80}} ??

{{champion:90}} I'm ALIIIIIIIIVVVVEEE!!!

{{champion:107}} Haha. Think again.
{{champion:90}} :Ults Rengar under tower, watches him die: STIIIL ALLLIIIIIIIIIIIIVE!

i actually died this way once, malz was really low under turret, i got close and ignite,but he ulted me (a team fight just ended, why the heck he still have his ult up)

we both died

> [{quoted}](name=kaltenashes,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=dU9eK478,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2015-12-30T20:05:47.804+0000)
>
>why the heck he still have his ult up
>

Because everyone knows your enemies are just bots that are there to make you rage and tilt

they're doom bots

i never played this mode tough
"stayin' alive, stayin' alive.."

> [{quoted}](name=ZylotheWolfbane,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=dU9eK478,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-12-30T18:29:17.617+0000)

then gets one-shot by him 30 seconds later ;)

> When you survive a very close fight. . . .
> Only to die to {{champion:81}} 's ult while you're recalling. . . .

FIXED
Actually about 73% of the time his ult misses and doesn't hit anything but minions.

not in situation like these, we've all been there 
(it's the first clip by the way)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j0YazXTUHdM
That would be the 27% of time that it actually hits.
Actually, about 73% of the time his ult succeeds, and specifically hits minions.

>When you survive a very NOT-close fight... or maybe not even a fight at all... you just touched a tower (I'M SORRY I DIDN'T MEAN IT!!!)

>https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=18mgZgSSPEk

FIXED AGAIN
shame on lux, she missed

"IM ALIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIVEEEE!!!!!"
Hulk jumps on him
".... ... ... ... ouch..."
It's all fun and games until {{champion:107}}  shows up

There should be a Marvel MOBA...Rito plz xD


Fyi:That "Rito plz" part was sarcastical.

Edit:What's the title name of the cartoon?

If I recall, it's the Hulk vs. Wolverine animated movie.

Deadpool is just in it as something of a sub-plot character.
Most likely a Deadpool one.
I actually don't think Deadpool got his own cartoon, he's always special guested(?) the hell outta everyone elses.
I wouldn't be surprised. I mean we are talking about Deadpool! The guy doesn't care about the 4th wall!
Double kill {{champion:74}}
THE SHELL MEANS NOTHING!{{champion:30}}

Hulk is me when I play evelynn
Outta nowhere kill that recalling person.
Too bad for the jungler, you still alive.
Even worse: you try to run to a bush to recall after a team fight only to get killed by minions. #noobproblems
Fuck Mega {{champion:150}}
Beware of Rengar.
